Comment.Language: During the Evening Raising of Incense (Psalm 141:1, 2):

Text.Language: Po#c# aiws oub/k cwtem e~roi: mah~y/k e~t~c~m/ n~te pa]ho: e~p~jin taws e~p~swi harok.
Lord, I cry out to You; make haste to me! Give ear to my voice when I cry out to You.

Let my prayer be set before You as incense, the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice
